alert.note: Alert for Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Between 8500 And 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 01 at 4:00AM MST until January 02 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 11 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches, with the heaviest falling across the peaks and west facing slopes. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Between 8500 and 11000 Feet and Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Feet. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 11 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact travel.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Between 8500 And 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft
